The left-wing need to stop shutting down conversations about immigration. Regardless of what one attributes the disproportionate violence among black and Asian gangs to, one has to accept that all demographics are not the same and to shout "RACIST!" every time someone expresses concern is childish and ignorant. The majority of those polled across Europe want immigration either majorly restricted or even stopped. It is one thing to have mass immigration from European countries, where the immigrants at least share cultural and religious values, but another to have mass immigration from countries with radically different, arguably incompatible cultures and religions that are also often hostile to Western culture.

Leftists, please recognise that those opposed to mass immigration are not necessarily driven by bigotry, but a genuine love for their culture and values and a rational fear of losing them.
